website_summaries.verdict: A four-piece, weather-resistant outdoor daybed that features an adjustable canopy and has a contemporary style.
pros: This affordable outdoor daybed is manufactured using a lightweight rattan and a durable steel frame
It features an adjustable canopy for protection from the sun and washable cushions
It can be broken down into four separate seats, if needed
cons: The accompanying instructions are not very clear, making the initial assembly an overly difficult task for some individuals

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like it. Only took like 45 minutes to put together. Only drawback so far is the instructions are not very clear. And the holes are not lined up entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Garette Wonch

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the purchase. After assembly, it looks and feels as expected. The assembly can be challenging for unorganized people because it has many pieces. It helps to identify the pieces for each step by their labels before starting the actual assembly. I did it all by myself. But getting another person holding pieces in position do help at some point. It looks nice as pictured. It is nice seating on it too. If you want to sleep on it, you may want to get a thicker cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As described. The canopy bar is a little flimsy and the tie straps are also a bit cheap. The cushion attachments are also pretty weak. These are not complaints per-se because for the price it’s really not bad. Just trying to make sure your expectations are not too high. If I were to put this in a rental property I would not expect the canopy or the cushions to last more than a season.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can buy one in the store already put together
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry I purchased this because it has to many pieces! The instructions made us laugh and screws were missing . We asked a builder to help us and he could not believe the craziness. Cushions are flimsy . Go to hay needle and pay extra to have a better product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great choice! Especially for the price! Love it, whole new goods with a little hard to assemble but the instructions are including the picture and video link. I am satisfied costumer to offer good service to us . We bought this to put on our garden. It could not be more perfect!
customer_reviews.author: qq64540574

customer_reviews.title: Clam shell bed
customer_reviews.text: Love it makes me fell like I’m on vacation in my own back yard
customer_reviews.author: annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is surprise me. I love it so much. Perfect fit for my family! Love it! This outdoor sectional sofa is extremely comfortable, it looks great on our patio! Cushions are very easy to wash and stain resistant so far! It is easy to assembly. My kids just can’t wait to seat there to enjoy the sun.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video and use the instructions, it’ll take some time and patience but it’s worth it. I was able to do it alone within two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Nichols

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! Cushions are a bit on the thin side, but covers can be taken off and washed. very relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dugger

customer_reviews.title: Great company.
customer_reviews.text: A piece was missing a hole for a screw. Company was great I let them know and they sent me a new piece within a few days. Easy to put together and very comfortable. Not bad value even though I have seen a few cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for... but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: The overall look is just what I expected. The assembly when reading the instructions first sounded incredibly easy but it wasn’t at all easy. It requires 2 people and a few of the holes were not completely pre-drilled through so I had to get my tools out to complete the job. All the pieces were labeled properly. Getting the canopy on was the hardest. The cushions need more thickness I did purchase a cover for it and so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jena P

customer_reviews.title: The look is nice, wish it was a little more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to put together, but it's quite solid after fully put together. The cushions are a little thin, and it only comes with 3 pillows, which don't fully cover the back. We ended up having to buy more pillows for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, instructions lacking though.
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of hours to assemble. Really need two people just due to size and where the joins are. Once assembled, its an excellent product. My wife and kids love it. Instructions were lacking a little and some parts did not have stickers, so keep an eye on which parts are marked. Have a question and received a quick response. Customer service is great with this company.
customer_reviews.author: LL Cool JS

customer_reviews.title: nice sofa
customer_reviews.text: it took me about 40 minutes to assemble it. the seller is very nice and gave me few instructions. the sofa is beautiful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Menlasion

customer_reviews.title: Cushion are to thin
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but only comes with 3 pillows and the cushions are very thin and stain easy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith LaVoie

customer_reviews.title: Great to read and enjoy the sun
customer_reviews.text: I was missing parts and emailed the company. They quickly sent the pieces I needed and I was able to assemble the lounge. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS! Just wish the padding were a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cool.!!!! A little annoying to put together not too bad. Cushions are not very thick. I purchased a separate cover, it is a must!!!
customer_reviews.author: edward h.

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to build
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The instructions were not the best and the holes did not match up with the screws. We had to make adjustments to the holes for the screws to be forced in. Cheaper is not always better. Regret purchasing it. I should have spent a little more money and I definitely would have gotten a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to spend this much on a chair, go ahead and spend a little more to get a better one. It is hard to put together, instructions are incomplete, and it doesn’t seem like it will last long (I may be wrong about this - the cushions will certainly not last long. Spend a little extra and get a better chair elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Adams

customer_reviews.title: Worst directions ever, but surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those weirdos that enjoys a good "assembly required" project. That being said, I almost quit and paid someone to finish the assembly. Worst directions ever. Worst packaging to hardware ever. Cushions could be a little thicker, but it's actually pretty comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit challenging to assemble, but it's a great looking product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this daybed! Little difficult to assemble with one person, would recommend two or more to help! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble just needed another person to hold things will Assembling. Love this piece so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly confusing
customer_reviews.text: Make sure and put the screws in the top of the chair backs as you assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Very bad bad bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Immediate return and reimbursement requested. A shame to sell such low quality items for this price.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCK L.

customer_reviews.title: great product, horrible assembly process
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is awesome! But it took more than 3 hours to put together. Stop counting....the instructions are really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product !
customer_reviews.text: I put it together all by myself and the directions were pretty clear would have liked better pictures but I am very happy with the results ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jake Westfall

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: looks great wife loves it follow directions to the letter wish i had waited a couple of weeks because it went on sale lol
customer_reviews.author: mike nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful and functional. I would prefer a thicker cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected a better quality , I regret not returning the product.
customer_reviews.text: The front of my day bed collapsed and I am very upset. Does this product come with a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It took my husband a little while to put together though!
customer_reviews.author: Jenell

customer_reviews.title: Thicker cushions
customer_reviews.text: Needs a thicker cushion and more pillows also needs to hide exposing over head rails
customer_reviews.author: Rich J. Lightfoot

product_meta.title: Devoko Patio Furniture Outdoor Round Daybed with Retractable Canopy Wicker Rattan Separated Seating Sectional Sofa for Patio Lawn Garden Backyard Porch Pool
feature_bullets: Contemporary Style : The design of patio daybed is stylish & elegant with round profile for comfort
Premium Standard : Made of lightweight rattan material with an adjustable canopy to block sunlight
Durable Upholstery : The high-standard elastic PE wicker is not easy to crack, rote or deteriorate
Weather-Resistant : With solid construction, it is stable & durable enough to withstand rain & wind

Wide Application : Easy to clean. Perfect for patio, garden, backyard, pool side, lawn, balcony etc（Notice: There are three boxes in total. If you only receive one or two box, please not worry, the other box is on the way to your house. Detail tracking information or other questions about products please contact us by amazon message）

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
